name: Naughty Girls Dress Up
description:
Loaded with snazzier looks and all new themes

Girls, you can go wild with clothes and accessories to create a virtual girl suiting your style.

Use your imagination and design looks that you love.

You can create new looks by changing the girl's tops, bottoms, and much, much more.

Play with your girlfriends and see who creates the most fashionable and trendy looks.
